is a small village located on the island of

value: Culla beach Looking south towards Nunton

Nunton is located a mile south of Balivanich, on the westerly route of the Island. Many busses pass through the village each day of the week, except Sunday.
Culla Bay is one of the Best Beaches on Benbecula, it streches from Nunton along to the neighbouring township of Aird. There are many access points to the beach from the Main road.

value: This is a Cafe, Gift Shop and Licensed Bar run by the Ladyman Family

There are two B & B's in Nunton for you to stay in or you could go down the road to Muir of Aird where you will also find a B & B. If it is a Hotel you are looking for The Dark Island Hotel is just 5 miles away in Liniclate. Or perhaps you are camping or Caravaning. Shell Bay Caravan Site is also in Liniclate with Excellent tourist facilities.

value: content=A  four room hostel with 4 bunks per room.
